function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor fit at higher temperatures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation in built environments","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and air circulation in built environments","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with proper filtration","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"Building managers, facility owners"},{"Description":"Slight curvature in the relationship with AH","Impact":"Inaccurate predictive models for disease propagation","Mitigation":"Using non-linear predictive models to account for curvature","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, computational modeling tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"RH alone is a poor predictor of viability","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease risk based on RH","Mitigation":"Using AH and T to assess disease risk instead of RH alone","Technologies":"Sensor technology for AH and T measurement","People":"Building designers, engineers","Owner":"Architectural firms, engineering companies"}]}
